## LogNode class

Computes the natural logarithm

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class LogNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns ln(x) (logarithm base e) for x &gt; 0. Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
